com.android.dialogs

Class ScrollViewSwitchDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • com.android.dialogs.AlertDialogs
        • com.android.dialogs.ScrollViewDialog
          • com.android.dialogs.ScrollViewSwitchDialog
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddConnectionDialog

    public class ScrollViewSwitchDialog
extends ScrollViewDialog
    Displays the alert dialog box that contains two ScrollView which can be toggled by a switcher in dialog. Dialog that extends ScrollViewDialog
    Author:
    Windows 7

    • Method Detail

      • buildDialogContent

        public void buildDialogContent(Builder builder)
        Description copied from class: ScrollViewDialog
        Adds ScrollViewDialog.dialogInnerView to dialog box. Overrides a part of AlertDialogs.onCreateDialog(Bundle) that is responsible for building a main part of the dialog. Instead of simple message, the entire new ScrollView will be added, based on value:
        • ScrollViewDialog.VIEW_ID
        that was created in ScrollViewDialog.newInstance(Integer, Integer, ScrollView, Integer, Integer, Integer). ID value that this method needs is stored in the key-value pair <ScrollViewDialog.VIEW_ID,X>, where X is that value.
        Overrides:
        buildDialogContent in class ScrollViewDialog
        Parameters:
        builder - AlertDialogs.dialogBuilder that builds entire dialog window

      • dialogInnerViewLogic

        public void dialogInnerViewLogic()
        Description copied from class: ScrollViewDialog
        Defines entire logic for custom ScrollView added to the dialog. Base logic is to initialize ScrollViewDialog.returnedData to store returned data. Extra logic commonly will consist of:
        • searching a view by Activity#findViewById(int)
        • setting a tag for the found view (and key for ScrollViewDialog.returnedData)
        • adding additional listeners to the view e.g.
          • OnCheckedChangeListener
          • TextWatcher
          • OnSeekBarChangeListener
        • setting default values for a key-value pair.
        See example: AddConnectionDialog.dialogInnerViewLogic().
        Overrides:
        dialogInnerViewLogic in class ScrollViewDialog
